ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ACK!
ygData.msgSnippet: Nodder mad brudda! Yub, yub, yub. Dat dey wuz bad when all dem pooheads came and tuuk Grobb. Troll wuz very sad and wailed like a rainy day. Den sum
ygData.messageBody:
Nodder mad brudda! Yub, yub, yub. Dat dey wuz bad when
all dem pooheads came and tuuk Grobb. Troll wuz very
sad and wailed like a rainy day. Den sum funny-luking
Hobbit start laffing at da cryin Troll. Called me
namez like Leaking Fat Tub of Lard. Furst I ask wut
Lard mean. Den he tellz me and wut a boo-boo dat was!
Anyways, Troll is gonna sit and let dat tasty Halfing
go nighty-night in me tummy and den me go round up
some bruddas afta to keel sum Froggies en Grukta (dis
name pissing me off!).

Livid Troll


--- Tony <tonyraye@...> wrote:
> I don't play EQ for a couple weeks and I come back
> to find out my home town
> has been overrun by FROGGIES... You know HOW MANY
> froggies I had ta eat
> when I was a little troll? I'm sick and tired of the
> things... Always
> jumpin around, trying ta kill little trolls...Now
> they invade MY hometown.
> My family has been ousted, made to eek out an
> existance collecting swamp
> scum and snake oil.... I WILL exact my revenge! I
> now have a purpose!
